config.script: console.log('ğŸ” æå–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå•†å®¶æ•°æ®...'); const offerItems = document.querySelectorAll('.sm-offer-item, .offer-item, .sm-offer, [class*=offer]'); console.log('æ‰¾åˆ° ' + offerItems.length + ' ä¸ªå•†å“é¡¹'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(1, offerItems.length); i++) { const item = offerItems[i]; const title = item.querySelector('h4, [class*=title], a[title]'); const wangwangSpan = item.querySelector('span.J_WangWang, span[class*=WangWang]'); const wangwangLink = wangwangSpan ? wangwangSpan.querySelector('a.ww-link') : null; if (wangwangLink && wangwangLink.href) { const merchantName = wangwangSpan.getAttribute('data-nick') || 'æœªçŸ¥å•†å®¶'; const decodedName = decodeURIComponent(merchantName); console.log(`æ‰¾åˆ°å•†å®¶: ${decodedName}`); console.log(`æ—ºæ—ºé“¾æ¥: ${wangwangLink.href}`); const merchants = [{ index: i, merchantName: decodedName, title: title ? title.textContent.trim().substring(0, 50) : '', chatUrl: wangwangLink.href, hasWangWang: true, realChatUrl: wangwangLink.href, merchantLink: wangwangLink.href }]; return { success: true, merchants: merchants, totalFound: offerItems.length, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }; } } return { success: false, error: 'æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æœ‰æ•ˆçš„æ—ºæ—ºé“¾æ¥', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };

console.log('ğŸ”„ å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªå•†å®¶...'); const batchData = arguments[0] || {}; const merchants = batchData.merchants || []; const currentIndex = 0; const currentMerchant = merchants[currentIndex]; console.log(`å¤„ç†å•†å®¶ ${currentIndex + 1}/${merchants.length}: ${currentMerchant.title.substring(0, 30)}`); return { success: true, currentMerchant: currentMerchant, currentIndex: currentIndex, merchants: merchants, totalToProcess: merchants.length, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };
